author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...CONDITIONS IN BERMUDA WILL RAPIDLY DETERIORATE LATE THIS AFTERNOON AND THIS EVENING...
summary: ...CONDITIONS IN BERMUDA WILL RAPIDLY DETERIORATE LATE THIS AFTERNOON AND THIS EVENING... As of 2:00 PM EDT Thu Oct 30 the center of Melissa was located near 29.0, -70.9 with movement NE at 30 mph. The minimum central pressure was 964 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 105 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...CONDITIONS IN BERMUDA WILL RAPIDLY DETERIORATE LATE THIS AFTERNOON AND THIS EVENING... As of 2:00 PM EDT Thu Oct 30 the center of Melissa was located near 29.0, -70.9 with movement NE at 30 mph. The minimum central pressure was 964 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 105 mph.

title: Summary - Hurricane Melissa (AT3/AL132025)
